EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-2414 - Additional Email Notifications Requested by Delivery Team
EmailTemplate.name: OMDHCaseCloseNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The IHS Markit Team has completed and closed case reference number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you have any additional questions on your query, please quote the above case reference number when contacting us.
Kind regards, IHS Markit
{!Case.Thread_Id}
